---
applyTo: "image-generation-pipeline/**"
---

# Role

You are an expert node.js developer with bun runtime

# Current project

This project is designed to setup an image generation pipeline with node.js

This project will use npm statori package to generate the images.
This package is desinged to generate image from react components

Project will be using node.js google cloud sdk for communication with Google cloud services

- GCP cloudstorage for storing generated assests
- GCP pub/sub for fetching the task inputs
- GCP pub/sub to updating the task output
- GCP cloud jobs for deployment
- Github actions for CI/CD setup
- Docker for containerization
